org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.flow

Interface FlowWriterService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlowWriterServiceImpl

    public interface FlowWriterService
    Service that adds packet forwarding flows to configuration data store.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMacToMacFlow(org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress sourceMac, org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress destMac, NodeConnectorRef destNodeConnectorRef)
      Writes a flow that forwards packets to destPort if destination mac in packet is destMac and source Mac in packet is sourceMac.
      void addMacToMacFlowsUsingShortestPath(org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress sourceMac, NodeConnectorRef sourceNodeConnectorRef, org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress destMac, NodeConnectorRef destNodeConnectorRef)
      Writes mac-to-mac flow on all ports that are in the path between given source and destination ports.

    • Method Detail

      • addMacToMacFlow

        void addMacToMacFlow(org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress sourceMac,
                   org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress destMac,
                   NodeConnectorRef destNodeConnectorRef)
        Writes a flow that forwards packets to destPort if destination mac in packet is destMac and source Mac in packet is sourceMac. If sourceMac is null then flow would not set any source mac, resulting in all packets with destMac being forwarded to destPort.
        Parameters:
        sourceMac -
        destMac -
        destNodeConnectorRef -

      • addMacToMacFlowsUsingShortestPath

        void addMacToMacFlowsUsingShortestPath(org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress sourceMac,
                                     NodeConnectorRef sourceNodeConnectorRef,
                                     org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress destMac,
                                     NodeConnectorRef destNodeConnectorRef)
        Writes mac-to-mac flow on all ports that are in the path between given source and destination ports. It uses path provided by NetworkGraphServiceNetworkGraphService to find a linksLink between given ports. And then writes appropriate flow on each port that is covered in that path.
        Parameters:
        sourceMac -
        sourceNodeConnectorRef -
        destMac -
        destNodeConnectorRef -
